document_name: Signed project document for Enabling Activities for the Preparation of Trinidad and Tobago's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.pdf

http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/TTO/00034324/Signed project document for Enabling Activities for the Preparation of Trinidad and Tobago's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The aim of the Second National Communication (SNC) to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) project is to enable Trinidad and Tobago to prepare a second report to the Conference of Parties of the UNFCCC

project_descr: Trinidad and Tobago: Climate Change Enabling Activity.  Self-assessment for preparation of a project proposal for Trinidad and Tobago's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.
